name: Mahjong Mania 2021
description:
The newest and free to play match2 game. You need to find all tiles with the same pattern. If you're a mahjong/jigsaw puzzle mania, this may be the game you've been looking forward to.

Features
1. Free to play
2. Easy to play with simple rules
3. 50+ styles of cute tiles: Balls, Fruit, Cakes, Cookies, Animals, Cube, Sports, Numbers, Mahjong... Each tile board is very different
4. Lots of themes and backgrounds are waiting for you.
5. Challenge interesting levels, collect more stars, and unlock more stages
6. Use Hint & shuffle & to help you beat levels
7. No worries, Play OFFLINE/FREE anytime, anywhere

What are you waiting for? Be prepared and start matching. Experience this fun tile-matching game and explore thousands of amazing puzzles and surprises.
